message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.AR 

This paper focuses on performance optimization in serverless edge-cloud platforms for smart edge devices, which involves distributed computing, networking, and system design. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). Additionally, the paper deals with real-time processing of input data, which suggests the category cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The framework proposed in the paper involves specifying cost and latency requirements, which falls under the category cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also discusses the implementation of a prototype, which involves software engineering, making cs.SE (Software Engineering) another likely category. Finally, the paper deals with container resource configuration, which is related to cs.AR (Hardware Architecture).
